com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.wrappers

Class ChatText

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.wrappers.BasicWrapper<IChatBaseComponentHandle>
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.wrappers.ChatText

  • public final class ChatText
extends BasicWrapper<IChatBaseComponentHandle>
    Minecraft formatted text represented as chat components, which can be converted between legacy chat messages and JSON formatted text.
